name: GoGetMeSomeRubies
description:
General Info:

If you want to email me with any questions or concerns my email is :

realnadlabs at gmail dot com. 

If you do not want to download the game.

(which I totally get) you can build it from the source code here. 

https://github.com/aimforbigfoot/GoGetMeSomeRubies

I used Godot version 3.3.1 to develop the game. You can download Godot over here

https://godotengine.org/download

Controls:

WASD to move (or arrow keys)

Mouse to look around

Tips:

Basically, smash space and click to grab anything you can see, you can hold down the mouse button if you really want. If you are playing this in the browser and lagging, try downloading the game or source code and running it natively on your desktop.
